mapper.update: MERGE INTO FSS_COMPANY_PRODUCT USING DUAL ON ( FIN_CO_NO = #{fin_co_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DCLS_MONTH = #{dcls_month, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET KOR_CO_NM = #{kor_co_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DCLS_CHRG_MAN = #{dcls_chrg_man, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOMP_URL = #{homp_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAL_TEL = #{cal_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_LST = #{id_lst, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DT_LST = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FIN_CO_NO, DCLS_MONTH, KOR_CO_NM, DCLS_CHRG_MAN, HOMP_URL, CAL_TEL, ID_FRT, DT_FRT, ID_LST, DT_LST ) VALUES( #{fin_co_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcls_month, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kor_co_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcls_chrg_man, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{homp_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cal_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id_frt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{id_lst, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )

MERGE INTO FSS_COMPANY_OPTION USING DUAL ON ( FIN_CO_NO = #{fin_co_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DCLS_MONTH = #{dcls_month, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET AREA_CD = #{area_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_NM = #{area_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXIS_YN = #{exis_yn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_LST = #{id_lst, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DT_LST = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FIN_CO_NO, DCLS_MONTH, AREA_CD, AREA_NM, EXIS_YN, ID_FRT, DT_FRT, ID_LST, DT_LST ) VALUES( #{fin_co_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcls_month, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exis_yn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id_frt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{id_lst, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )

MERGE INTO FSS_MORTGAGELOAN_PRODUCT USING DUAL ON ( FIN_CO_NO = #{fin_co_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FIN_PRDT_CD = #{fin_prdt_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DCLS_MONTH = #{dcls_month, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET KOR_CO_NM = #{kor_co_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIN_PRDT_NM = #{fin_prdt_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOIN_WAY = #{join_way, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOAN_INCI_EXPN = #{loan_inci_expn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERLY_RPAY_FEE = #{erly_rpay_fee, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DLY_RATE = #{dly_rate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOAN_LMT = #{loan_lmt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DCLS_STRT_DAY = #{dcls_strt_day, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DCLS_END_DAY = #{dcls_end_day, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIN_CO_SUBM_DAY = #{fin_co_subm_day, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_LST = #{id_lst, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DT_LST = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FIN_CO_NO, FIN_PRDT_CD, DCLS_MONTH, KOR_CO_NM, FIN_PRDT_NM, JOIN_WAY, LOAN_INCI_EXPN, ERLY_RPAY_FEE, DLY_RATE, LOAN_LMT, DCLS_STRT_DAY, DCLS_END_DAY, FIN_CO_SUBM_DAY, ID_FRT, DT_FRT, ID_LST, DT_LST ) VALUES( #{fin_co_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fin_prdt_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcls_month, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kor_co_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fin_prdt_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{join_way, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loan_inci_expn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{erly_rpay_fee, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dly_rate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loan_lmt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcls_strt_day, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcls_end_day, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fin_co_subm_day, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id_frt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{id_lst, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )

MERGE INTO FSS_MORTGAGELOAN_OPTION USING DUAL ON ( FIN_CO_NO = #{fin_co_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FIN_PRDT_CD = #{fin_prdt_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DCLS_MONTH = #{dcls_month, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MRTG_TYPE = #{mrtg_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RPAY_TYPE = #{rpay_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND LEND_RATE_TYPE = #{lend_rate_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MRTG_TYPE_NM = #{mrtg_type_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPAY_TYPE_NM = #{rpay_type_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEND_RATE_TYPE_NM = #{lend_rate_type_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEND_RATE_MIN = #{lend_rate_min, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEND_RATE_MAX = #{lend_rate_max, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEND_RATE_AVG = #{lend_rate_avg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_LST = #{id_lst, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DT_LST = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FIN_CO_NO, FIN_PRDT_CD, DCLS_MONTH, MRTG_TYPE, RPAY_TYPE, LEND_RATE_TYPE, MRTG_TYPE_NM, RPAY_TYPE_NM, LEND_RATE_TYPE_NM, LEND_RATE_MIN, LEND_RATE_MAX, LEND_RATE_AVG, ID_FRT, DT_FRT, ID_LST, DT_LST ) VALUES( #{fin_co_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fin_prdt_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcls_month, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mrtg_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rpay_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lend_rate_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mrtg_type_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rpay_type_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lend_rate_type_nm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lend_rate_min, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lend_rate_max, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lend_rate_avg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id_frt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{id_lst, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
